main event: Three blush-white triangular shaped objects were observed over Fresno, California on 7 May 1958, appearing to be stationary before fading from sight.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 3 hours,The objects were described as similar to a star,Other commercial airliners in the area reported seeing the same objects, There is a possibility that the observed objects were balloons, The bright star Arcturus was noted to be visible at the approximate time of the incident.
